# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Returns a new 4 x 4 double-precision matrix from a Spatial projective transform.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ projectiveTransform: ProjectiveTransform3DFloat)
```

## Discussion

Values are rounded to a representable value, if necessary.
